com.bmwcarit.barefoot.roadmap

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.topology.Path<Road>
      • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.roadmap.Route

  • public class Route
extends Path<Road>
    Route in a Road network that consists of a start and end RoadPoint and sequence of Roads.

      Creates a Route object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Route

        public Route(RoadPoint point)
        Creates a Route object. (This is a base case that consists of only one RoadPoint.)
        Parameters:
        point - RoadPoint that is start and end point.

      • Route

        public Route(RoadPoint source,
             RoadPoint target,
             List<Road> roads)
        Creates a Route object.
        Parameters:
        source - Source/start RoadPoint of the route.
        target - Target/end RoadPoint of the route.
        roads - Sequence of Roads that make the route.

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets size of the route, i.e. the number of Roads that make the route.
        Returns:
        Number of the Roads that make the route.

      • get

        public Road get(int index)
        Gets Road by index of the sequence of Road objects.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the road to be returned from the sequence of roads.
        Returns:
        Road at the given index.

      • length

        public double length()
        Gets length of the Route in meters, uses cost function Distance to determine the length.
        Returns:
        Length of the Route in meters.

      • time

        public double time()
        Gets travel time for the Route in seconds, uses cost function Time to determine travel time.
        Returns:
        Travel time of the Route in seconds.

        public boolean add(Path<Road> other)
        Description copied from class: Path
        Adds a Path at the end of this path.
        Overrides:
        add in class Path<Road>
        Parameters:
        other - Path ot be added at the end of this path.
        Returns:

      • geometry

        public com.esri.core.geometry.Polyline geometry()
        Gets geometry of the Route from start point to end point by concatenating the geometries of the roads in the route's road sequence respectively.
        Returns:
        Geometry of the route.

      • FromJSON

        public static Route FromJSON(org.json.JSONObject json,
                             RoadMap map)
                      throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates a Route object from its JSON representation.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON representation of the Route.
        map - RoadMap object as the reference of RoadPoints and Roads.
        Returns:
        Route object.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - thrown on JSON extraction or parsing error.
